html: 1.24.19  12:17 pm   My friends are always mean to me and I really don't want to be around them but if I stop hanging out with them I am going to be all alone because nobody else wants to be friends with me. I don't know what to do. btw I'm putting this here to vent but if you do happen to see this and have any advice that would be nice.

1.24.19  12:05 pm   im in my SS class, and i highly doubt there is a reason to learn about the aftermath of WW1 and how they had lots of extra money, like,, sure its great they had fun but we know the great depression is right after so why wont we just skip over the spending splurge right to the GD? what is the point?

      If so, do you think there's a particular reason for this?
